cards.title: Eye-Catching Graphics that Demand Attention.
cards.name: Jimmy
cards.description: Eye-Catching Graphics that Demand Attention.DGME 167 student, Jimmy Lu's vibrant web design is a visual feast that showcases his playful and creative approach to graphic design, reflecting Jimmy's unique style, making it a standout in the digital world!

cards.title: Stand Up, Speak Out!
cards.name: Team
cards.description: DGME 102 students, Michelle, Isaiah & Alexander teamed up to create this simple yet striking design combined with the powerful message. The choices of strong colors and icons make for a strong statement against this harmful behavior.
